short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power users can quickly search on different platforms (such as Jira, Zendesk, Google or IMDB) with just few hotkeys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to quickly setup and search on multiple different platforms at once with just your keyboard. By using keyboard shortcuts (hot keys), you can find your JIRA, Zendesk, Salesforce and many other productivity platform tickets in an instant. You will be able to cut down on the amount of time and frustration searching and switching between different tabs dramatically.

Outside of productivity platforms, you also can add Google, Facebook, Imdb, Reddit and many other social platforms to Quick Customizable Search as well.
